Articles.Content:
So who here is buying other people KSP for Xmas?

I mean where is the downside? More KSP purchases means more money for development AND you don't have to hunt around for weeks in malls before eventually buying them socks or a cheese knife set?

My father-in-law will be getting it, if it wouldn't get me in trouble the wife would have it too!
I do. I am buying it for my cousin. And I totaly agrre its a cool gift and you ge to give money to SQAD for more development yeey :-)
I wish I knew more people that would enjoy a game like this. Scott Manley is my closest friend that plays KSP (and he doesn't even know we are friends!)
Hmm, I should get it for my brother. I am not sure he'd appreciate it though. I just asked him if he wanted to watch Gravity, and he said no.
